name: Cavern Crumblers (itch)
description:
Cavern Crumblers

Grab your friends and stock up on grenades for this fast-paced single-screen local multiplayer shooter. Compete with each other in an environment filled with destructible terrain that crumbles around you from your bullets and grenades. Run, jump, and dodge your way through the destruction with simple controls and intuitive physics. With gameplay that's easy to pick up but hard to master, Cavern Crumblers is sure to give you and your friends an exciting couch gaming experience for hours on end.

Features

4 Player Local Multiplayer Mayhem

Destructible Terrain

Platformer Feel

Multiple Competitive Game Modes

  • Optional AI Enabled Players to Fight Against
  • Full Controller and Keyboard/Mouse Support
